name: Trouble Brewing
description:
Chamomile, the witch of the forest, has trapped Pieris, a fire spirit, in the cauldron to save the forest from burning down. You must keep making potions to use up the fire spirit’s power, keeping the cauldron from boiling over and burning down the forest.

Find ingredients and brew potions in this isometric fantasy game! 

Best in Programming and 3rd place submission for Hot Jam 2021.
